reviewText: This is not only good for Greeks to watch, but also for the non Greek friends (if they have any LOL) to watch as well.  Really good for the young Greek children to watch as well

If you are greek american you will truly appreciate this documentary.  It will ring true to a life that we have all experienced in america.  It may even make you feel like calling your cousins across the states just to tell them how much you love them!
